alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Houston; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, west central Bleckley and southeastern Houston Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Sand Bed, or 11 miles north of Hawkinsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hayneville, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Sand Bed, Kathleen, Klondike and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
